<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

Generate a new BIP-39 mnemonic phrase (12 or 24 words) for wallet creation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the generate_mnemonic endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Generate a new mnemonic phrase for wallet creation","required":["use_24_words"],"properties":{"use_24_words":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to generate a 24-word mnemonic instead of 12-word","default":false,"example":false}},"title":"GenerateMnemonic"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from generate_mnemonic","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing the generated mnemonic phrase","required":["mnemonic"],"properties":{"mnemonic":{"type":"string","description":"The generated BIP-39 mnemonic phrase","example":"abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon about"}},"title":"GenerateMnemonicResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
